H0.text: Carnivore is the type of organism that converts wastes and dead materials into nutrients that can be used by plants.

H1.text: Herbivore is the type of organism that converts wastes and dead materials into nutrients that can be used by plants.

H2.text: Decomposers convert wastes and dead materials into nutrients that can be used by plants.

H3.text: Producer is the type of organism that converts wastes and dead materials into nutrients that can be used by plants.

A4.text: Decomposers are organisms that break down dead organisms and release the nutrients from the dead matter into the environment around them.
